Changelog#

v0.1.4 (14/05/2022)#

  • init now does not coerce column classes

v0.1.3 (27/04/2022)#

  • repr set right for dataframes with pandas version <= 1.4.0

  • tidyframe init now accepts inputs and passes them to pd.DataFrame

  • Along with accepting a pandas dataframe

v0.1.2 (24/04/2022)#

  • minor bugfix where skimpy is now optional!

v0.1.1 (22/04/2022)#

  • Patch for First release of tidypandas!

v0.1.0 (22/04/2022)#

  • First release of tidypandas!
